resources.string: Replace previous Home screen and settings

"Back up the data will be backed up to your Mi Cloud when your device is connected to WLAN: *\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009Apps and Home screen layout *\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009Ringtones, wallpapers, and fonts *\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009Alarm clock and time settings *\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009Notification settings *\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009Do not disturb mode settings *\u0009\u0009\u0009\u0009MIUI and system settings Note: Data for apps you've installed won't be backed up to Mi Cloud."
Get more storage space, daily backups, and more.
Apps, Home screen and system settings
Home screen will restart and apps will be downloaded automatically when connected to WLAN

Restore Home screen apps and settings using this backup. This will overwrite app data for duplicate apps already installed on this device. Apps not included in the backup will be moved to the last Home screen.
Found a Mi Cloud backup for this device. Restore Home screen apps and settings or use it as a new device and erase previous Mi Cloud backups?
This feature requires an internet connection.
Turned on backups for Home screen apps
